entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #47615
  • `BuildArgsWithDotnetRun` doesn't forward global properties #47614
    10.0.1xx
  • New `dotnet test` experience should support post-processing of artifacts #47613
    10.0.1xx
  • Make `--interactive` not require boosting MSBuild logger verbosity to `minimal` from `quiet` #47602
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #47595
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.2xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #47594
  • Add template for dotnet.config to dotnet new #47589

Closed

  • .NET SDK Finalizer Feature Band calculation doesn't match SDK's calculation #43876
  • dotnet run has potentially suspicious handling of global properties #47561
  • Unified Embedded .NET Solution #47588

PullRequests

Created

  • dotnet CLI: Removed CommandLineValidation directory #47619
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • sln-list: Add format options #47618
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet CLI: Removed .Designer files #47617
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Add validation for command-line arguments related to new dotnet test #47616
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to AwesomeAssertions #47611
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't get produced packages from transitive references in other build passes #47610
    Area-VMR
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #47609
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #47608
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'release/9.0.3xx' #47603
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Publish symbols of RuntimeAnalyzers #47598
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use interpolated string handler for logging #47590
    Area-dotnet test, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #47569
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
    Area-Infrastructure, 10.0.1xx
  • Update Microsoft.AspNetCore.Watch.BrowserRefresh to net8.0 #47509
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #47601
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Consolidate redist infrastructure #47604
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't run the GetProducedPackages target early when previous build pass dependencies are referenced #47560
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Update GivenThatWeWantMSBuildToRespectCustomCulture.cs #47565
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update sln in reaction to the recent file moves #47605
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move src/Installer components under src/Layout for better sharing and consolidation #47597
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47559
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add baselining mechanism to the build comparison tool #47562
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Put only hard fingerprinted files into import map during publish #47515
    Area-AspNetCore, 10.0.1xx
  • Rely on RunCommand for the new dotnet test experience for MTP #47493
    Area-dotnet test, untriaged
  • Extract version badge generation from redist-installer.proj #47544
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Cleanup special handling of command-line options that are now forwarded as global properties #47557
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid intermediate FullNugetVersion file #47542
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Github Actions] Labels: Add extra labels to check #47564
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Update `dotnet run file.cs` spec with new ignored directives syntax #47543
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Select the NativeAOT runtime pack as the target package when it's provided as part of the KnownILCompilerPack metadata #46611
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Remove primary vertical concept from JoinVerticals #47338
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Create trust boundary doc Fixes #45340 #45666
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Add command 'dotnet project add' #47500
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Revert changes to NativeAot test due to runtime update #47443
    untriaged, Area-NativeAOT
  • Fix dotnet format failure to handle slnx files #47508
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK, DO NOT MERGE
  • Run installer tests in pipeline #47313
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve pruned package data loading and handling #46898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #47514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Draft of guidelines for managing various kinds of breaking changes in the SDK #45288
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • `dotnet package list` command should restore first #47400
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
